author: ahinzmann
body:
PR description:

This is a followup of #28558, introducing a parameter to steer the eta-range for the treatment of charged particles not associated to vertices. This is to optimize PUPPI with phase-1 tracking. The performance was discussed here:
https://indico.cern.ch/event/876142/#5-update-on-puppi-tuning

This PR implements the necessary switches without changing the current behavior of the algorithm, i.e. no changes to RECO+MiniAOD are expected from this PR.

PR validation:

runtests

Backports

We would like to have these options backported to 10_6_X, to introduce a new PUPPI configuration for UL MiniAOD-v2 and for JMEcustomNanoAODs as soon as the PR is merged.
title: Add parameter for treatment of charged high eta in PUPPI
